name: jdc_person_id
title: JCOIN data commons person identifier
description: The generated unique identifier specific to the JCOIN Data Commons for a given individual (client or staff).

name: visit_number
title: Visit Number
description: A number that identifies the visit or timepoint of data collection (baseline=1 and each subsequent follow up is 2 or greater).

name: visit_type
title: Visit Type
description: The visit type/category (either baseline or follow up)

name: s1a
title: Last time drug use
description: Last time a person used alcohol or other drugs weekly or more often
enum: Never,More than a year ago,4 to 12 months ago,2 to 3 months ago,Past month,Do not know,Not reported
notes: Not reported not a part of the core measures but id'ed a few missing values that cant be accounted for by skip logic. In future, may want to make more precise
jcoin:core_measure_question: When was the last time you used alcohol or other drugs weekly or more often?

name: s1b
title: Last time drug use: getting, using, or recovering
description: Last time a person spent a lot of time either getting alcohol or other drugs, using alcohol or other drugs, or recovering from the effects of alcohol or other drugs (feeling sick)
enum: Never,More than a year ago,4 to 12 months ago,2 to 3 months ago,Past month,Do not know,Not reported
notes: Not reported not a part of the core measures but id'ed a few missing values that cant be accounted for by skip logic. In future, may want to make more precise
jcoin:core_measure_question: When was the last time you spent a lot of time either getting alcohol or other drugs, using alcohol or other drugs, or recovering from the effects of alcohol or other drugs (feeling sick)?

name: s1c
title: Last time drug use: social dysfunction
description: Last time a person kept using alcohol or other drugs even though it was causing social  problems, leading to fights, or getting you into trouble with other people
enum: Never,More than a year ago,4 to 12 months ago,2 to 3 months ago,Past month,Do not know,Not reported
notes: Not reported not a part of the core measures but id'ed a few missing values that cant be accounted for by skip logic. In future, may want to make more precise
jcoin:core_measure_question: When was the last time you kept using alcohol or other drugs even though it was causing social   problems, leading to fights, or getting you into trouble with other people?

name: s1d
title: Last time drug use: work or life dysfunction
description: Last time a person's use of alcohol or other drugs caused giving up or reducing involvement in activities at work, school, home or social events
enum: Never,More than a year ago,4 to 12 months ago,2 to 3 months ago,Past month,Do not know,Not reported
notes: Not reported not a part of the core measures but id'ed a few missing values that cant be accounted for by skip logic. In future, may want to make more precise
jcoin:core_measure_question: When was the last time your use of alcohol or other drugs caused you to give up or reduce your involvement in activities at work, school, home or social events?

name: s1e
title: Last time drug use: withdrawal
description: Last time a person had withdrawal problems from alcohol or other drugs like shaky hands, throwing up, having trouble sitting still or sleeping, or used any  alcohol or other drugs to stop being sick or avoid withdrawal problems
enum: Never,More than a year ago,4 to 12 months ago,2 to 3 months ago,Past month,Do not know,Not reported
notes: Not reported not a part of the core measures but id'ed a few missing values that cant be accounted for by skip logic. In future, may want to make more precise
jcoin:core_measure_question: When was the last time you had withdrawal problems from alcohol or other drugs like shaky hands, throwing up, having trouble sitting still or sleeping, or you used any  alcohol or other drugs to stop being sick or avoid withdrawal problems?

name: s2a
title: Last time drug use: any opioids
description: Last time a person used any kind of heroin, fentanyl, or other opioid
enum: Never,More than a year ago,4 to 12 months ago,2 to 3 months ago,Past month,Do not know,Not reported
notes: Not reported not a part of the core measures but id'ed a few missing values that cant be accounted for by skip logic. In future, may want to make more precise
jcoin:core_measure_question: When was the last time you used any kind of heroin, fentanyl or other opioid?(such as codeine, Darvocet, Darvon, Demerol, Dilaudid, Karachi, OxyContin, Oxys, Percocet, Propoxyphene, morphine, opium, Talwin or Tylenol with codeine, Vicodin, Zohydro)?

name: s2b
title: Last time drug use: opioid overdose
description: Last time a person had an opioid overdose
enum: Never,More than a year ago,4 to 12 months ago,2 to 3 months ago,Past month,Do not know,Not reported
notes: Not reported not a part of the core measures but id'ed a few missing values that cant be accounted for by skip logic. In future, may want to make more precise
jcoin:core_measure_question: When was the last time you had an opioid overdose? [used enough of the drug that it produced a life-threatening reaction that required medical attention]

name: s2c
title: Last time drug use: OUD medication-assisted treatment
description: Last time a person had a medication assisted treatment for opioid use disorder
enum: Never,More than a year ago,4 to 12 months ago,2 to 3 months ago,Past month,Do not know,Not reported
notes: Not reported not a part of the core measures but id'ed a few missing values that cant be accounted for by skip logic. In future, may want to make more precise
jcoin:core_measure_question: When was the last time you went to any kind of medication assisted treatment for opioid use disorder?

name: s3a
title: Opioid Overdose Count
description: Number of times a person overdosed on heroin, fentanyl or other opioids during the past 90 days  (or prior to entering jail or prison/since last assessment).
notes: Overdose means that you took enough of the drug that it caused a life-threatening reaction that required medical attention
jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days [prior to entering jail or prison/since your last assessment], how many times did you overdose on heroin, fentanyl or other opioids?  [Overdose means that you took enough of the drug that it caused a life-threatening reaction that required medical attention]

name: s3b
title: Opioid Overdose Count: Receiving Naloxone
description: Number of times a person received naloxone (Evzio or Narcan) to reverse your overdose during the past 90 days  (or prior to entering jail or prison/since last assessment).
notes: Overdose means that you took enough of the drug that it caused a life-threatening reaction that required medical attention
jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days [prior to entering jail or prison/since your last assessment], how many times did you receive naloxone (Evzio or Narcan) to reverse your overdose?

name: s3c
title: Person Who Administered Nalaxone for Overdose
description: People who administered naloxone or narcan
notes: TODO: expand fields to each of the possible selections
jcoin:core_measure_question: Who administered the naloxone or Narcan? (SELECT ALL THAT APPLY)

name: s3d
title: Drugs 4 hrs Before Overdose
description: Drugs taken in the 4 hours before overdose
notes: TODO: expand fields to each of the possible selections
jcoin:core_measure_question: What drugs had you taken in the 4 hours before you overdosed? (SELECT ALL THAT APPLY)

name: s3e
title: Emergency Medical Service Following Overdose
description: Number of times a person received emergency medical service following an overdose
jcoin:core_measure_question: How many of these times did you receive emergency medical service following an overdose?

name: s3f
title: Emergency Department Visit Count Following Overdose
description: Number of times a person went to the emergency department following an overdose
jcoin:core_measure_question: How many of these times did you go to the emergency department following an overdose?

name: s3g
title: Hospital Admissions Count Following Overdose
description: Number of times a person got admitted to the hospital following an overdose
jcoin:core_measure_question: How many of these times did you get admitted to the hospital following an overdose?

name: s3h
title: Substance Use Treatment Referral Count Following Overdose
description: Number of times a person received a referral to substance use treatment from the police, EMS, ED or hospital staff
jcoin:core_measure_question: How many of these times did you receive a referral to substance use treatment from the police, EMS, ED or hospital staff?

name: s4a
title: Drug Use Count
description: Number of times a person used any heroin, fentanyl, opioids, alcohol, marijuana or other illicit drugs  during the past 90 days  (or prior to entering jail or prison/since last assessment).
jcoin:core_measure_question: During the 90 days (prior to entering jail or prison/since your last assessment), on how many days did you use any heroin, fentanyl, opioids, alcohol, marijuana or other illicit drugs?

name: s4b
title: Alcohol Use Count
description: Number of times a person drank any kind of alcohol (beer, gin, rum, scotch, tequila, whiskey, wine or mixed drinks)
jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days [prior to entering jail or prison/since your last assessment], how many times did you drink any kind of alcohol (beer, gin, rum, scotch, tequila, whiskey, wine or mixed drinks)?

name: s4c
title: Alcohol Use Count: Binge Drinking
description: Number of times a person had 5 or more drinks during the past 90 days  (or prior to entering jail or prison/since last assessment).
jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days [prior to entering jail or prison/since your last assessment], how many times did you have 5 or more drinks?

name: s4d
title: Marijuana use count: medical
description: Number of times a person used medical marijuana that was obtained from a dispensary with their own recommendation card or prescription during the past 90 days  (or prior to entering jail or prison/since last assessment).
jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days [prior to entering jail or prison/since your last assessment], how many times did you use medical marijuana that was obtained from a dispensary with your own recommendation card or prescription?

name: s4e
title: Marijuana use count: Not own
description: Number of times a person used other marijuana, including hashish, edibles, tinctures or concentrated drops, blunts or other forms of THC (cannabis, herb, pot, reefer, weed), or medical marijuana that was not their own
jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days [prior to entering jail or prison/since your last assessment], how many times did you use other marijuana, including hashish, edibles, tinctures or concentrated drops, blunts or other forms of THC (cannabis, herb, pot, reefer, weed), or medical marijuana that was not your own?

name: s4f
title: Opioid use count: Heroin
description: Number of times a person used heroin (alone or mixed with other drugs) during the past 90 days  (or prior to entering jail or prison/since last assessment).
jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days [prior to entering jail or prison/since your last assessment], how many times did you use heroin (alone or mixed with other drugs)?

name: s4g
title: Opioid use count: Fentanyl
description: Number of times a person used fentanyl (alone or mixed with other drugs)  during the past 90 days  (or prior to entering jail or prison/since last assessment).
jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days [prior to entering jail or prison/since your last assessment], how many times did you use fentanyl (alone or mixed with other drugs)?

name: s4h
title: Opioid use count: Street Methadone
description: Number of times a person used nonprescription or street methadone  during the past 90 days  (or prior to entering jail or prison/since last assessment).
jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days [prior to entering jail or prison/since your last assessment], how many times did you use nonprescription or street methadone?

name: s4j
title: Opioid use count: Suboxone
description: Number of times a person used nonprescription or street Suboxone  during the past 90 days  (or prior to entering jail or prison/since last assessment).
jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days [prior to entering jail or prison/since your last assessment], how many times did you use use nonprescription or street Suboxone?

name: s4k
title: Opioid use count: other
description: Number of times a person used other opioids, opiates, painkillers, or other analgesics (such as codeine, Darvocet, Darvon, Demerol, Dilaudid, Karachi, OxyContin, Oxys, Percocet, Propoxyphene, morphine, opium, Talwin or Tylenol with codeine, Vicodin, Zohydro)  during the past 90 days  (or prior to entering jail or prison/since last assessment).
jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days [prior to entering jail or prison/since your last assessment], how many times did you use other opioids, opiates, painkillers, or other analgesics (such as codeine, Darvocet, Darvon, Demerol, Dilaudid, Karachi, OxyContin, Oxys, Percocet, Propoxyphene, morphine, opium, Talwin or Tylenol with codeine, Vicodin, Zohydro)?

name: s4m
title: Cocaine use count
description: Number of times a person used crack, smoked rock, freebase, or other forms of cocaine during the past 90 days  (or prior to entering jail or prison/since last assessment).
jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days [prior to entering jail or prison/since your last assessment], how many times did you use crack, smoked rock, freebase, or other forms of cocaine?

name: s4n
title: Speed use count
description: Number of times a person used any methamphetamines, amphetamines, or other forms of speed during the past 90 days  (or prior to entering jail or prison/since last assessment).
jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days [prior to entering jail or prison/since your last assessment], how many times did you use any methamphetamines, amphetamines, or other forms of speed?

name: s4p
title: Benzodiazapine, anti-anxiety, and tranquilizer use count
description: Number of times a person used any benzodiazepines, anti-anxiety drugs or tranquilizers (such as Ativan, Equanil, Dalmane, Deprol, Diazepam, Klonopin, Librium, Lortab, Meprobamate, Miltown, Prosom, Serax, Traxene, Valium, Verseed, Xanax) during the past 90 days  (or prior to entering jail or prison/since last assessment).
jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days [prior to entering jail or prison/since your last assessment], how many times did you use any benzodiazepines, anti-anxiety drugs or tranquilizers (such as Ativan, Equanil, Dalmane, Deprol, Diazepam, Klonopin, Librium, Lortab, Meprobamate, Miltown, Prosom, Serax, Traxene, Valium, Verseed, Xanax)?

name: s4z
title: Drug use count: other
description: Number of days a person use any other drug that has not been mentioned (such as hallucinogens, downers) during the past 90 days  (or prior to entering jail or prison/since last assessment).
jcoin:core_measure_question: During the 90 days (prior to entering jail or prison/since your last assessment), on how many days did you use any other drug that has not been mentioned (such as hallucinogens, downers)?

name: s4z_describe
title: Drug use: description of other drugs
description: A description of drugs that have not been mentioned (such as hallucinogens, downers) during the past 90 days  (or prior to entering jail or prison/since last assessment).
jcoin:core_measure_question: During the 90 days(prior to entering jail or prison/since your last assessment), on how many days did you use any other drug that has not been mentioned (such as hallucinogens, downers)? (Please describe )

name: s5
title: Place of No Opioid Use (Jail, Hospital, etc)
description: Number of days a person has been in jail, hospital, or other place where they could not use heroin, fentanyl, other opioids, alcohol, marijuana, or other drugs
jcoin:core_measure_question: During the 90 days (prior to entering jail or prison/ since your last assessment), on how many days have you been in a jail, hospital or other place where you could not use heroin, fentanyl, other opioids, alcohol, marijuana or other drugs? (USE 0 FOR NONE)

name: j1a
title: Activities against law besides drugs
description: During the past 90 days (since last assessment), on how many days were a person involved in any activities that might get a person into trouble or be against the law besides drug use? [IF 0, GO TO J2]
jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days (since last assessment), on how many days were you involved in any activities that might get you into trouble or be against the law besides drug use? [IF 0, GO TO J2]

name: j1a1
title: Drug possession
description: Number of times  a person  been in possession of small amounts of drugs? (drug possession)
notes: (common charge names associated with behavior for reference only)
jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days (since last assessment), how many times have you  been in possession of small amounts of drugs? (drug possession)

name: j1a2
title: Drunkenness or other liquor law violations
description: Number of times  a person  been drunk or high in public? (drunkenness or other liquor law violations)
notes: (common charge names associated with behavior for reference only)
jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days (since last assessment), how many times have you  been drunk or high in public? (drunkenness or other liquor law violations)

name: j1a3
title: Driving under the influence or while intoxicated
description: Number of times  a person  driven a vehicle while under the influence of alcohol or drugs? (driving under the influence or while intoxicated)
notes: (common charge names associated with behavior for reference only)
jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days (since last assessment), how many times have you  driven a vehicle while under the influence of alcohol or drugs? (driving under the influence or while intoxicated)

name: j1a4
title: Possession, dealing, distribution or sale of drugs
description: Number of times  a person …sold, distributed or helped to make illegal drugs?  (possession, dealing, distribution or sale of drugs)
notes: (common charge names associated with behavior for reference only)
jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days (since last assessment), how many times have you …sold, distributed or helped to make illegal drugs?  (possession, dealing, distribution or sale of drugs)

name: j1a5
title: Vandalism or property destruction
description: Number of times  a person  purposely damaged or destroyed property that did not belong to a person? (vandalism or property destruction)
notes: (common charge names associated with behavior for reference only)
jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days (since last assessment), how many times have you  purposely damaged or destroyed property that did not belong to you? (vandalism or property destruction)

name: j1a6
title: Receiving, possessing or selling stolen goods
description: Number of times  a person  bought, received, possessed or sold any stolen goods? (receiving, possessing or selling stolen goods)
notes: (common charge names associated with behavior for reference only)
jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days (since last assessment), how many times have you  bought, received, possessed or sold any stolen goods? (receiving, possessing or selling stolen goods)

name: j1a7
title: Forgery, fraud or embezzlement
description: Number of times  a person  passed bad checks, forged or altered a prescription, or took money illegally from an employer?  (forgery, fraud or embezzlement)
notes: (common charge names associated with behavior for reference only)
jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days (since last assessment), how many times have you  passed bad checks, forged or altered a prescription, or took money illegally from an employer?  (forgery, fraud or embezzlement)

name: j1a8
title: Shoplifting
description: Number of times  a person  taken something from a store without paying for it? (shoplifting)
notes: (common charge names associated with behavior for reference only)
jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days (since last assessment), how many times have you  taken something from a store without paying for it? (shoplifting)

name: j1a9
title: Larceny or theft
description: Number of times  a person  other than from a store, taken money or property that didn't belong to a person? (larceny or theft)
notes: (common charge names associated with behavior for reference only)
jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days (since last assessment), how many times have you  other than from a store, taken money or property that didn't belong to you? (larceny or theft)

name: j1a10
title: Burglary or breaking and entering
description: Number of times  a person  broken into a house or building to steal something or just to look around? (burglary or breaking and entering)
notes: (common charge names associated with behavior for reference only)
jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days (since last assessment), how many times have you  broken into a house or building to steal something or just to look around? (burglary or breaking and entering)

name: j1a11
title: Motor vehicle theft
description: Number of times  a person  taken a car without people in it that didn't belong to a person? (motor vehicle theft)
notes: (common charge names associated with behavior for reference only)
jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days (since last assessment), how many times have you  taken a car without people in it that didn't belong to you? (motor vehicle theft)

name: j1a12
title: Carjacking
description: Number of times  a person  taken a car from someone who was in it? (carjacking)
notes: (common charge names associated with behavior for reference only)
jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days (since last assessment), how many times have you  taken a car from someone who was in it? (carjacking)

name: j1a13
title: Simple assault or battery
description: Number of times  a person  hit someone or gotten into a physical fight? (simple assault or battery)
notes: (common charge names associated with behavior for reference only)
jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days (since last assessment), how many times have you  hit someone or gotten into a physical fight? (simple assault or battery)

name: j1a14
title: Robbery
description: Number of times  a person  used a weapon, force, or strong-arm methods to get money or things from a person? (robbery)
notes: (common charge names associated with behavior for reference only)
jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days (since last assessment), how many times have you  used a weapon, force, or strong-arm methods to get money or things from a person? (robbery)

name: j1a15
title: Aggravated assault or battery
description: Number of times  a person  hurt someone badly enough they needed bandages or a doctor? (aggravated assault or battery)
notes: (common charge names associated with behavior for reference only)
jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days (since last assessment), how many times have you  hurt someone badly enough they needed bandages or a doctor? (aggravated assault or battery)

name: j1a16
title: Forcible rape
description: Number of times  a person  made someone have sex with a person by force when they did not want to have sex? (forcible rape)
notes: (common charge names associated with behavior for reference only)
jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days (since last assessment), how many times have you  made someone have sex with you by force when they did not want to have sex? (forcible rape)

name: j1a17
title: Murder, homicide or no-negligent manslaughter
description: Number of times  a person  been involved in the death or murder of another person, including accidents? (murder, homicide or no-negligent manslaughter)
notes: (common charge names associated with behavior for reference only)
jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days (since last assessment), how many times have you  been involved in the death or murder of another person, including accidents? (murder, homicide or no-negligent manslaughter)

name: j1a18
title: Arson
description: Number of times  a person  intentionally set a building, car or other property on fire? (arson)
notes: (common charge names associated with behavior for reference only)
jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days (since last assessment), how many times have you  intentionally set a building, car or other property on fire? (arson)

name: j1a19
title: Prostitution, pimping or commercialized sex
description: Number of times  a person  traded sex for food, drugs or money? (prostitution, pimping or commercialized sex)
notes: (common charge names associated with behavior for reference only)
jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days (since last assessment), how many times have you  traded sex for food, drugs or money? (prostitution, pimping or commercialized sex)

name: j1a99
title: Other unlawful activities
description: Number of times  a person  done something else that would have gotten a person into trouble with the police if they had known about it? (carrying a weapon, gang involvement, domestic violence, trespass, gambling, distributing the peace, disorderly conduct, paraphernalia, runaway, curfew, truancy,  ) (PLEASE DESCRIBE)
notes: (common charge names associated with behavior for reference only)
jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days (since last assessment), how many times have you  done something else that would have gotten you into trouble with the police if they had known about it? (carrying a weapon, gang involvement, domestic violence, trespass, gambling, distributing the peace, disorderly conduct, paraphernalia, runaway, curfew, truancy,  ) (PLEASE DESCRIBE)

title: Overall charged arrests
description: Number of a times person was arrested and charged
jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days (since last assessment), how many times were you arrested and charged?

jcoin:core_measure_question: Number of arrests for other charges (carrying a weapon, gang involvement, domestic violence, trespass, gambling, disturbing the peace, disorderly conduct, paraphernalia, runaway, curfew, truancy)

name: j3a
title: Electronic monitoring
description: Number of days person has been on electronic monitoring
jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days (since last assessment), how many days have you been  on electronic monitoring?

name: j3b
title: House arrest
description: Number of days a person has been on house arrest
jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days (since last assessment), how many days have you been  on house arrest?

name: j3c
title: Jail time
description: Number of days a person has been in jail

title: Prison time
description: Number of days a person has been in prison

name: j3e
title: Current jail or prison
description: Person is currently in jail or prison
notes: MBK: added Unknown to satisfy a small amount of respondents for one hub.
jcoin:core_measure_question: Are you currently in jail or prison? (CAN MARK IF OBVIOUS)

name: j3f
title: Length of jail or prison time
description: Length of jail or prison time for this episode
jcoin:core_measure_question: How long have you been in jail or prison? (just this episode)

name: j4a
title: Parole
description: Number of days a person has been on parole
jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days (since last assessment), how many days have you been on parole?

name: j4b
title: Probation
description: Number of days a person has been on probation
jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days (since last assessment), how many days have you been on probation?

name: j4c
title: Other kind of community supervision
description: Number of days a person has been on any other kind of community supervision
jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days (since last assessment), how many days have you been on any other kind of community supervision?

name: j4d
title: Meeting with probation or parole officer
description: Number of days a person has met with a probation or parole officer
jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days (since last assessment), how many days have you met with your probation or parole officer?

name: j4e
title: Trouble with probation or parole officer
description: Number of days a person has been in trouble with a probation or parole officer
jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days (since last assessment), how many days have you been in trouble with your probation or parole officer?

name: j5a
title: Life time arrests
description: Number of days a person has been arrested in their lifetime (including juvenile)
jcoin:core_measure_question: During your lifetime, how many times in your life have you been arrested including as a juvenile?

name: j5b
title: First time arrest
description: Age at time of first arrest
jcoin:core_measure_question: During your lifetime, how old were you the first time you were arrested?

name: j5c_years
title: Lifetime years in detention, jail, or prison time
description: Number of times a person has spent in detention, jail or prison during a personr lifetime?
jcoin:core_measure_question: During your lifetime, how much total time have you spent in detention, jail or prison during your lifetime?

name: j5c_months
title: Lifetime months in detention, jail, or prison time
description: Number of times a person has spent in detention, jail or prison during lifetime
jcoin:core_measure_question: During your lifetime, how much total time have you spent in detention, jail or prison during your lifetime?

name: j5d
title: Lifetime guity and sentenced
description: Number of times a person has been found guilty and sentenced (including adjudications as a a personth or convictions as an adult)
jcoin:core_measure_question: During your lifetime, how many times have you been found guilty and sentenced (including adjudications as a youth or convictions as an adult)?

name: j5e
title: First time adjudication conviction
description: Age at which a person was first adjudicated and convicted
jcoin:core_measure_question: During your lifetime, how old were you the first time you were adjudicated or convicted?

name: u1
title: Emergency room:  Number of visits
description: Number of times person had to go to ER
jcoin:core_measure_section: During the past xx days (since last assessment), how many times have you had to go to an emergency room without being admitted to the hospital?

name: u2
title: Hospital detox program: Number of nights
description: Number of nights person was in hospital detox for alcohol/drug use
jcoin:core_measure_section: During the past xx days (since last assessment), how many nights were you in a hospital detoxification program for your alcohol and other drug use (across all episodes)?

name: u3
title: Hospitalization:  Number of nights
description: Number of nights person was in hospital other than detox
jcoin:core_measure_section: During the past xx days (since last assessment), how many nights were you in a hospital for any other reason than detoxification?

name: u4
title: Residential detox: Number of nights
description: Number of nights person was in non-hospital/social/residential detox
jcoin:core_measure_section: During the past xx days (since last assessment), how many nights were you in a non-hospital or social detoxification program from alcohol or other drugs (also called residential detox)?

name: u5a
title: Residential treatment program for alcohol/drugs: Number of nights
description: Number of nights person was in residential treatment program for alcohol/drug use
jcoin:core_measure_section: During the past xx days (since last assessment), how many nights were you in a residential treatment program for alcohol or drug use?

name: u5b
title: Residential treatment program for mental health: Number of nights
description: Number of nights person was in residential treatment program for mental health
jcoin:core_measure_section: During the past xx days (since last assessment), how many nights were you in a residential treatment program for mental health?

name: u5c
title: Rehab facility for physical health: Number of nights
description: Number of nights person was in rehab facility for physical health
jcoin:core_measure_section: During the past xx days (since last assessment), how many nights were you in a residential, nursing home, or other rehabilitation facility for your physical health?

name: u6
title: Primary care provider:  Number of visits
description: Number of times person has visited primary care provider
jcoin:core_measure_section: During the past xx days (since last assessment), how many times have you visited a primary care provier (physician, nurse, nurse practitioner, or physician's assistant)?

name: u6a
title: Primary care visit reason: Alcohol/drug use
description: Indicates whether or not person visited primary care provider for alcohol/drug use
jcoin:core_measure_section: Why did you visit a primary care provider:  Alcohol or other drug use?

name: u6b
title: Primary care visit reason: Mental health
description: Indicates whether or not person visited primary care provider for mental health
jcoin:core_measure_section: Why did you visit a primary care provider:  Mental health?

name: u6c
title: Primary care visit reason:  Physical health
description: Indicates whether or not person visited primary care provider for physical health
jcoin:core_measure_section: Why did you visit a primary care provider:  Physical health?

name: u6d
title: Primary care visit reason:  Some other reason (specify)
description: Indicates whether or not person visited primary care provider for some other reason
jcoin:core_measure_section: Why did you visit a primary care provider:  Some other reason?

name: u6d_specify
title: Primary care visit reason: Specify other reason
description: Specifies other reason person visited primary care provider
jcoin:core_measure_section: Specify other reason you visited primary care provider

name: u7
title: Outpatient treament program for alcohol/substance use: Number of days
description: Number of days person participated in outpatient alcohol/substance use treatment program
jcoin:core_measure_section: Other than times you already mentioned above, during the past 3 months (since last assessment), how many days did you participate in any other outpatient treatment program specializing in alcohol or substance use?

name: u7a
title: Outpatient treatment program: Number of days physically visiting program
description: Number of days person physically visited outpatient treatment program
examples: Note that the more accurate way to think about this item is number of times or "on how many days;" i.e., they are not full days.
jcoin:core_measure_section: How many of these days did you physically visit the (outpatient treatment) program?

name: u7b
title: Outpatient treatment program: Number of days participating online
description: Number of days person participated in outpatient tx program online
examples: Note that the more accurate way to think about this item is number of times or "on how many days;" i.e., they are not full days.
jcoin:core_measure_section: How many of these days did you participate (in the outpatient tx program) online (e.g., smart phone, computer, or tablet)?

name: u7c
title: Outpatient treatment program: Number of days seeing doctor
description: Number of days person saw a doctor at outpatient tx program
examples: Note that the more accurate way to think about this item is number of times or "on how many days;" i.e., they are not full days.
jcoin:core_measure_section: How many of these days did you see a doctor (at the outpatient treatment program)?

name: u7d
title: Outpatient treatment program: Number of days participating in therapy
description: Number of days person only participated in therapy at outpatient tx program
examples: Note that the more accurate way to think about this item is number of times or "on how many days;" i.e., they are not full days.
jcoin:core_measure_section: How many of these days did you only participate in individual or group therapy?

name: u7e
title: Outpatient treatment program: Number of days for medication management
description: Number of days person only received medication management at outpatient tx program
examples: Note that the more accurate way to think about this item is number of times or "on how many days;" i.e., they are not full days.
jcoin:core_measure_section: How many of these days were for medication management only?

name: u8
title: Psychiatrist/psychologist:  Number of total visits
description: Number of times person has seen a psychiatrist or psychologist:  Total
examples: Psychologist is only PhD or PsyD?  Not LCSW or anything else?
jcoin:core_measure_section: Other than times you already mentioned above, during the past 3 months (since last assessment), how many times have you seen a psychiatrist (MD) or psychologist (Ph.D., Psy.D)?

name: u8a
title: Psychiatrist/psychologist: Number of in-person visits
description: Number of times person has seen a psychiatrist/psychologist:  In person
jcoin:core_measure_section: How many of these times did you physically visit the program (psychiatrist/psychologist)?

name: u8b
title: Psychiatrist/psychologist: Number of online visits
description: Number of times person has seen a psychiatrist/psychologist:  Online
jcoin:core_measure_section: How many of these times did you participate online (phone, computer, or tablet; with a psychiatrist/psychologist)?

name: u9
title: Counselor/social worker: Number of total visits
description: Number of times person has seen a counselor/social worker:  Total
jcoin:core_measure_section: Other than times you already mentioned above, during the past 3 months (since last assessment), how many times have you seen any other kind or counselor or social worker?

name: u9a
title: Counselor/social worker: Number of in-person visits
description: Number of times person has seen a counselor/social worker:  In person
jcoin:core_measure_section: How many of these times did you physically visit the program (counselor/social worker)?

name: u9b
title: Counselor/social worker: Number of online visits
description: Number of times person has seen a counselor/social worker:  Online
jcoin:core_measure_section: How many of these times did you participate online (phone, computer, or tablet; with a counselor/social worker)?

name: u13
title: Healthcare cost
description: Amount of money person has spent on healthcare
jcoin:core_measure_section: In the past xx days (since last assessment), how much money have you spent on all healthcare (e.g., copayments or prescriptions)?

name: u14
title: Substance use treatment
description: Indicates whether or not person has received substance use treatment
jcoin:core_measure_section: Have you received any substance use treatment in the past xx days (since last assessment)?

name: u14a
title: Substance use tx provider:  Well-organized
description: Indicates level of agreement with provider's organization
jcoin:core_measure_section: The provider is organized and well-run.

name: u14b
title: Substance use tx provider:  Satisfaction
description: Indicates level of satisfaction with provider
jcoin:core_measure_section: You are satisfied with this provider.

name: u14c
title: Substance use tx provider:  Efficient staff
description: Indicates level of agreement with provider's staff efficiency
jcoin:core_measure_section: The staff are efficient at doing their job.

name: u14d
title: Substance use tx provider:  Personal counseling
description: Indicates level of agreement with personal counseling provided
jcoin:core_measure_section: You can get plenty of personal counseling at this provider.

name: u14e
title: Substance use tx provider:  Medication assistance for opioid use
description: Indicates level of agreement with provider's medication assistance
jcoin:core_measure_section: You can get plenty of medication assistance for opioid use at this provider.

name: m1
title: Not candidate for OUD treatment
description: Indicates person is not a candidate for OUD treatment
jcoin:core_measure_section: If respondent is not a candidate for OUD treatment, mark here and skip this set of items.

name: m2_meds
title: Preferred type of OUD treatment:  OUD medication
description: Indicates person prefers OUD medication for treatment
jcoin:core_measure_section: Which type of OUD treatment would you most prefer if it were available to you now:  OUD medication?

name: m2_detox
title: Preferred type of OUD treatment:  Detox
description: Indicates person prefers detox for treatment
jcoin:core_measure_section: Which type of OUD treatment would you most prefer if it were available to you now:  Detox?

name: m2_outpt_counsel
title: Preferred type of OUD treatment:  Outpatient counseling
description: Indicates person prefers outpatient counseling for treatment
jcoin:core_measure_section: Which type of OUD treatment would you most prefer if it were available to you now:  Outpatient counseling?

name: m2_outpt_intensive
title: Preferred type of OUD treatment:  Intensive outpatient
description: Indicates person prefers intensive outpatient for treatment
jcoin:core_measure_section: Which type of OUD treatment would you most prefer if it were available to you now:  Intensive outpatient?

name: m2_residential
title: Preferred type of OUD treatment:  Residential treatment
description: Indicates person prefers residential treatment for OUD
jcoin:core_measure_section: Which type of OUD treatment would you most prefer if it were available to you now:  Residential treatment?

name: m2_other
title: Preferred type of OUD treatment:  Other treatment
description: Indicates person prefers other treatment for OUD
jcoin:core_measure_section: Which type of OUD treatment would you most prefer if it were available to you now:  Other?

name: m2_other_specify
title: Preferred type of OUD treatment:  Other treatment specified
description: Specifies other treatment person prefers for OUD
jcoin:core_measure_section: Which type of OUD treatment would you most prefer if it were available to you now:  Other treatment specified.

name: m2_none
title: Preferred type of OUD treatment:  No treatment
description: Indicates person prefers no treatment for OUD
jcoin:core_measure_section: Which type of OUD treatment would you most prefer if it were available to you now:  No treatment?

name: m2_dk
title: Preferred type of OUD treatment:  Don't know or no preference
description: Indicates person does not know (or does not have) an OUD treatment preference
jcoin:core_measure_section: Which type of OUD treatment would you most prefer if it were available to you now:  Don't know or no preference?

name: m3
title: Preferred OUD medication
description: Specifies which OUD medication person prefers
jcoin:core_measure_section: Which OUD medication treatment type would you most prefer if it were available to you now?
jcoin:core_measure_question: Methadone|Buprenorphine/Suboxone|Naltrexone/Vivitrol|Don't know/No preference

name: m4
title: Type of buprenorphine preferred
description: Specifies which type of buprenorphine person would prefer
jcoin:core_measure_question: I would prefer to receive daily buprenorphine-naloxone sublingual tablets or films (Suboxone)|I would prefer to receive monthly or weekly buprenorphine injections (e.g., Sublocade, Brixadi)|I would prefer to receive the 6-month buprenorphine implant|Don't know/No preference

name: m5
title: Type of naltrexone preferred
description: Specifies which type of naltrexone person would prefer
jcoin:core_measure_question: I would prefer to receive daily naltrexone oral (Revia)|I would prefer to receive monthly naltrexone injections (Vivitrol)|Don't know/No preference
